name: cobol
description: IntelliSense, highlighting, snippets, and code browsing for COBOL and more

coboleditor.enable_rocket_cobol_lsp_when.markdownDescription: Enable 'Micro Focus COBOL Extensions LSP' when active

coboleditor.enable_rocket_cobol_lsp_lang.markdownDescription: Invoke 'Micro Focus COBOL LSP Server Control' when switching to Micro Focus language

coboleditor.enable_exec_sql_cursors.markdownDescription: When 'enabled' parse 'EXEC SQL Cursor' for references

coboleditor.scan_comments_for_references.markdownDescription: When 'enabled' and 'scan_comments_for_hints' is also enabled, include any references in search

coboleditor.scan_comment_for_ls_control.markdownDescription: When 'enabled' comments are scanned for 'begin/end-ls-ignore' comment

out_of_range_tabstop_size.description: tabstop size for out of range tabs

coboleditor.tabstops_anchors.description: An array of filenames/patterns and its associated source format

coboleditor.copybookdirs.description: COBOL CopyBook directories to search into

coboleditor.copybooks_nested.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases
coboleditor.copybooks_nested.markdownDescription: nest copybooks in outline view (restart required)
coboleditor.copybooks_nested.description: nest copybooks in outline view (restart require)

coboleditor.cache_metadata_inactivity_ti.markdownDescription: Inactivity timeout for metadata cache in ms
coboleditor.cache_metadata_inactivity_ti.title: Inactivity timeout for metadata cache in ms

coboleditor.cache_metadata_verbose_messa.description: Show log message during meta data processing

jcleditor.margin.description: When enabled, always apply margin shading for JCL source code
jcleditor.margin.markdownDescription: When enabled, *always* apply margin shading for JCL source code

coboleditor.margin.description: When enabled, always apply margin shading for COBOL source code
coboleditor.margin.markdownDescription: When enabled, *always* apply margin shading for COBOL source code

coboleditor.margin_identification_area.description: When enabled, the identification area (columns 73-80) for fixed format source files are treated comments
coboleditor.margin_identification_area.markdownDescription: When enabled, the identification area (columns 73-80) for fixed format source files are treated comments

coboleditor.fileformat_strategy.title: always_fixed, always_variable, always_free, always_terminal or normal
enumDescriptions: Assume source code is fixed source format
Assume source code is variable source format
Assume source code is free source format
Assume source code is terminal source format
Determine source code format or configure it with fileformat

items.title: List of properties to match file format

enumDescriptions: source code format fixed (classic COBOL margins)
source code format variable (no right margin)

coboleditor.fileformat.description: An array of filenames/patterns and its associated source format

coboleditor.enable_tabstop.description: When enabled, activate COBOL tab/detab key

coboleditor.out_of_range_tabstop_size.description: Tabstop size when outside of defined tabstop range

coboleditor.comment_line.description: When enabled, activate COBOL comment key

coboleditor.outline.markdownDescription: Configure or disable outline view for COBOL
coboleditor.outline.description: on=everything, partial=no paragraphs, skeleton=basic structure and off
enumDescriptions: Scans everything in the source (can be costly)
Scans very little but might be enough for basic navigation

coboleditor.pre_scan_line_limit.title: Set pre-scan line limit
coboleditor.pre_scan_line_limit.description: Set pre-scan line limit, used to determine if source is COBOL or a CopyBook.

coboleditor.linter.description: When enabled, activate basic linting (limited to sections/paragraph use)

coboleditor.linter_mark_as_information.description: When enabled, mark all linter problems as information (false is hint)

coboleditor.linter_unused_sections.description: When enabled, activate basic linting (limited to sections use)

coboleditor.linter_unused_paragraphs.description: When enabled, activate basic linting (limited to paragraph use)

coboleditor.linter_port_helper.description: When enabled, activate basic source code portation linting

coboleditor.sourceview_include_jcl_files.description: Include JCL Files in source view

coboleditor.sourceview_include_hlasm_fil.description: Include HLASM Files in source view

coboleditor.sourceview_include_pli_files.description: Include PL/I Files in source view

coboleditor.sourceview_include_doc_files.description: Include Documentation Files in source view

coboleditor.sourceview_include_script_fi.description: Include Script Files in source view

coboleditor.sourceview_include_object_fi.description: Include Object Files in source view

coboleditor.sourceview_include_test_file.description: Include Test Files in source view

coboleditor.line_comment.title: Replace standard comment in/out with COBOL aware version
coboleditor.line_comment.description: Replace standard comment in/out with COBOL specific version

coboleditor.mfunit.diagnostic.color.description: Enable ANSI color when using the Micro Focus™Unit Testing Framework (mfunit) in terminal

coboleditor.intellisense_add_space_keywo.description: A list of keywords that require a space afterwards

coboleditor.intellisense_item_limit.title: Max number of items to return
coboleditor.intellisense_item_limit.description: Max number of items to return (default 120)

items.title: Custom intellisense rule (item:[clu=])
items.patternErrorMessage: Invalid custom intellisense rule (item:[clu]) where c=camelcase, u=uppercase, l=lowercase or = unchanged

coboleditor.process_metadata_cache_on_st.description: Process metadata cache on extension load (default false)

coboleditor.linter_ignore_section_before.description: Do not issue a warning if a unused section occurs before a entry-point, as this is often used to stop code trickling through to the next statements.

coboleditor.linter_ignore_missing_copybo.description: When enabled, do not generate copybook warnings

coboleditor.linter_ignore_malformed_usin.description: When enabled, do not generate missing warnings about malformed 'using'

coboleditor.scan_comments_for_hints.description: When enabled, process scanner hints embedded in comments

coboleditor.scan_comment_copybook_token.description: Comment token used for processing source code dependencies, for example extra copybooks

coboleditor.format_constants_to_uppercas.description: When enabled, ensures all constants are folded to uppercase (when field formatting is actioned)

coboleditor.maintain_metadata_recursive_.description: When 'Maintain Metadata Cache' is enabled, recursive search for source code filenames/copybooks

coboleditor.enable_semantic_token_provid.description: When enabled, turn on the semantic token provider

coboleditor.valid_cobol_language_ids.description: Valid Visual Studio COBOL Language Id

items.title: Valid Visual Studio COBOL Language Id
items.patternErrorMessage: Invalid language id, can be COBOL, COBOLIT, ACUCOBOL, RMCOBOL or COBOL_MF_LISTFILE or ILECOBOL

coboleditor.files_exclude.description: list of files to exclude from source scanning, it can be used to avoid 'unresponsive' messages

items.description: list of files to exclude from source scanning, it can be used to avoid 'unresponsive' messages

coboleditor.scan_line_limit.title: Set source scanner line limit
coboleditor.scan_line_limit.description: Set source scanner line limit, it can be used to avoid 'unresponsive' messages

coboleditor.scan_time_limit.title: Set scan time limit in ms
coboleditor.scan_time_limit.description: Set scan time limit, it can be used to avoid 'unresponsive' messages

coboleditor.in_memory_cache_size.title: Size of internal memory cache
coboleditor.in_memory_cache_size.description: Size of internal memory cache for scanned source code

coboleditor.suggest_variables_when_conte.title: Suggest variables when context is unknown
coboleditor.suggest_variables_when_conte.description: Suggest variables when context for a verb is unknown

coboleditor.hover_show_known_api.title: Show description of known api during 'hover'
coboleditor.hover_show_known_api.markdownDescription: Show a short description of known apis when hovered on.  Known apis include 'Micro Focus™Library apis' and some ILE apis.

coboleditor.comments_tags.description: Tags which are used to color the comments.

coboleditor.columns_tags.description: Tags which are used to color the margins.
coboleditor.columns_tags.deprecationMessage: This feature is not enabled.. this message will be removed when it is...

coboleditor.enable_tab_next_or_previous.description: When enabled, allow tab to be used for 'next'/'previous' suggestions

coboleditor.enable_tab_inline.description: When enabled, allow tab to be used for inline suggestions

coboleditor.hover_show_encoded_literals.description: When enabled, decode hex literals when hover over them

coboleditor.hover_show_variable_definiti.description: When enabled, show variable definition when hover over them

coboleditor.check_file_format_before_fil.description: When enabled, process coboleditor.fileformat before scanning the file

coboleditor.template_rocket_cobol.description: Template for a minimum 'Micro Focus' COBOL program

default: *>  Description : ${2:The description of the test case}
*> Add any other test setup code here
*> Load the library that is being tested

coboleditor.enable_codelens_variable_ref.description: When enabled, turn on codelens for variable references

coboleditor.enable_codelens_section_para.description: When enabled, turn on codelens for sections/paragraphs references

coboleditor.enable_codelens_copy_replaci.description: When enabled, turn on codelens for simple copy replacing

coboleditor.enable_program_information.description: When enabled, turn on call hierarchy provider (WIP)

commands.title: Scan source files in workspace for metadata
New COBOL Unit Test Program (Micro Focus)

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run cp-resources && npm run compile && webpack --mode production
scripts.webpack: npm run compile && npm run cp-resources && webpack --mode development
scripts.package-web: npm run compile && npm run cp-resources && webpack --mode production --devtool hidden-source-map
scripts.cp-resources: npm run cp-mermaid && npm run cp-panzoom && npm run cp-vscode-elements-lite
